bio: Confuze will make you babble and mumble. He's the worst when you have to read aloud in class!

soultimate.name: Uh, Er... Hold On
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drop foe's movement speed by 50% and Move Meter speed by 30% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Attack to decrease foes' speed for a time.

skill.effect: Speed up by 12% when HP is full.
skill.name: Can't Touch This

name: Confuze
